question: Which country has won the 2018 Best Exhibitor Award (BEA) at ITB - Berlin?
explanation: India has won the 2018 Best Exhibitor Award (BEA) at ITB - Berlin on March 10, 2018. ITB-Berlin World Tourist Meet was convened at German capital Berlin from March 7 to 10, 2018. India was represented by Tourism Minister K. J. Alphons along with Ministry officials. More than 100 countries participated in the ITB- Berlin meet with their respective Tourism Ministers. India\'s Incredible India (Ministry of Tourism) presented a short film named \"Yogi of the Racetrack \" in the meet. The said short film has got 3.2 million hits in 60 hours.
